[Recommended] Very good noise reduction but the sound slightly distorted
Adjust noise reduction level. Increase to better filter out ambient noise. Decrease if the sound is too low
Adjust sound amplification. Increase to better hear the beats. Decrease to reduce the sound saturation
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
Do not display this warning message anymore

"No wired headphone detected, this application will not work correctly. A headphone (with no microphone) is required to avoid audio feedback that generates a lot of spurious noises.
Note: if you are using a bluetooth headphone, do not consider this message."
If you enjoy this app, please take a few seconds to rate it. Thank you for your support !
[Recommended] Audio recording is shared as video (required format for facebook)
[Not Recommended] Audio recording are shared as audio file
"Sorry, your version of Android does not allow to generate a video file. Do you want to share your recording as audio file?"
"An error has occurred during video generation. Do you want to share your recording as audio file?"
Start/Stop audio listening by clicking on switch on/off button (left button).
Start/Stop audio recording by clicking on record button (central button). Audio recording file is automatically saved when you stop recording.
Most right button open a page where you can replay, delete or share your audio recordings.

"The sound of a heartbeat is very weak in terms of intensity and frequency. Your smartphone is not designed to work on such sounds and some models don't manage to capture these sounds correctly. On these smartphones, the application will not work . However, the feedback from users shows that this application works on most of recent models (nexus 4-5, Galaxy S 3-4-5 , Galaxy Note 2-3, LG Optimus , etc. ) . We hope that the application will work with your smartphone and if it is not the case, we apologize."
Make sure you use a headphone without integrated microphone. this application does not work with headset
Remove the shell of your device
Check if the sound level of the device is high enough
Make sure to be in a quiet room
If you do not hear your heart:
Make sure the microphone is pressed against the skin. The Microphone is a small hole on the underside of the device.
Avoid layers of clothing between the microphone and the skin. A teeshirt is the maximum, the best is to apply the microphone directly on the skin
Increase volume level of the device
Increase amplication level in the application settings and restart listening

If you have applied past advice and you still can not hear your heart, it is probably because your device does not have a sensitive enough microphone. By consequence, the application will not work correctly on your device, Sorry. Try with another device if you have the opportunity .
If the sound crackles or saturates:
Decrease volume level of the device
Decrease amplication level in the application settings and restart listening
If you hear hissing sounds or noise:
Increase noise reduction level in application settings and restart listening

The button above launches an audio sample of a heartbeat recorded by this application (with a nexus 4). If you do not hear anything, it means your headphone badly restores low sounds and you have to use another one. With good conditions, you can hear an equivalent heartbeat sound.
